name: Gruppe 16: SuperSmashup
description:
Controls 
Player 1:

Q:     Build Ship OR Place Building
W:     Build Wall
E:     Build Upgrade OR Rotate Building OR Drop Bomb from ship
A:     Build Farm
S:     Build Anti Air
D:     Build Cannon

Player 2: 
Page Up:     Build Ship OR Place Building
Arrow Up:    Build Wall
Page Down:   Build Upgrade OR Rotate Building OR Drop Bomb from ship
Arrow Right: Build Farm
Arrow Down:  Build Anti Air
Arrow Left:  Build Cannon
